body.name: DaVinci Jayden 4-in-1 Convertible Crib in Chestnut, Greenguard Gold Certified
features: GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED: This product has undergone rigorous scientific testing for over 10,000 chemical emissions and VOCs. It contributes to cleaner indoor air, creating a healthier environment for your baby to sleep, play, and grow

GROWS WITH BABY: Four adjustable mattress positions that can be lowered as your baby begins to sit and stand. Easily converts to toddler bed, daybed, and full-size bed (toddler conversion kit #M3099 and full-size conversion kit #M5789 sold separately)
QUALITY MATERIAL: Made of solid sustainable New Zealand pine wood -only the best for your baby
FOR YOUR BABY'S SAFETY: Say goodbye to toxic chemicals! Finished in a non-toxic multi-step painting process and lead and phthalate safe

COMPLETE THE LOOK: Shop Jayden 4-Drawer Dresser & 6-Drawer Dresser for a coordinated nursery. While this crib is a standard size regular crib, for a best fit we recommend DaVinci's line of non-toxic, GREENGUARD gold mattresses
body.description: Built to the highest standards of comfort and safety, our Jayden 4-in-1 Crib features an elegantly curved back with simple solid slats. GREENGUARD Gold Certified and constructed from 100% natural solid New Zealand pine wood, the Jayden Crib combines traditional appeal with timeless clean lines. As baby grows, this crib can be converted for use as a toddler bed, daybed and full-sized bed.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Jayden 3-Drawer Changer Dresser Complete Slumber Crib & Toddler Mattress Jayden 6-Drawer Double Wide Dresser MDB Bookcase Toddler Bed Conversion Kit

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful rich color
reviews.reviewText: This crib feels so well made and for the price I feel like it couldn't be beat. My fiancé said it was very easy to assemble and it looks beautiful in baby boy's nursery!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Of all the baby products to assemble the crib was by far the easiest. Beautiful wooden finish matches all other furniture in the room. Easy to wipe off and safe for baby to sleep with no worries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful crib. The crib does nick easily though. Sturdy and easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid pinewood construction and safe to use for baby
reviews.reviewText: Highlights: Solid New Zealand pine; Greenguard Gold Certified (reduced exposure to VOCs and toxic chemicals, meaning improved indoor air quality); non-toxic paint; lead and phthalate safe.Easy to put together, but had a couple of nicks when it arrived (somewhat hidden, so not a big deal for me). The chestnut color looks really nice. Paired it with a Shiloh musical mobile and a dual-sided standard crib mattress + organic waterproof mattress cover + organic cotton fitted crib sheet (make sure never to use bumpers, pillows, blankets/quilts, toys etc. around baby while in the crib). Has 4 levels to raise/lower mattress as needed. Make sure to buy the toddler bed- as well as the full size-conversion kits (both sold separately) to ensure the convertible crib's usage till the kid is well into their teen years (and beyond, as a guest bed). And don't forget to register all your baby products!Only thing was that I had to wait for about a month for it to arrive, but Amazon was on top of it and shipped it out as soon as it was manufactured , as a result of which I received a brand new piece!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This was an easy to assemble crib and feels really sturdy. Looks good, and was well protected in the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice Crib but don’t order it from Amazon
reviews.reviewText: Cute crib but my advice would be not to order any furniture like this from amazon as it arrived damaged as always. I had to contact million dollar baby for replacement parts for damage that was done by amazon during shipping. Luckily the lady I spoke with was understanding and nice and has heard this same complaint before and was happy to send me new parts to replace the damaged ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I am always nervous about purchasing large pieces of furniture online because I never know how the quality will be or if it will even arrive undamaged. I am happy to report that I was very pleased with this purchase. It arrived in one large box and was well packaged. There were only two minor scratches (see photos), and I think it would be a miracle if it arrived with zero blemishes. I am 35 weeks pregnant and assembled this crib myself. That's not to say it wouldn't be easier with two people, but it's doable with one. The instructions weren't great, but I navigated them and assembled it without any problems. The only additional thing you need is a phillips head screwdriver. The frame is sturdy, and the wood seems to be sturdy as well. I haven't used the crib yet, so I cannot make a comment on its durability, but it seems like it will hold up well. It also seems like it will be easy to drop the mattress spring to a lower level once needed. Overall, I would recommend this crib, especially for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2017
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this crib! It's very beautiful and very sturdy. I actually put it together by myself when I was about 5 months pregnant. That part was a bit difficult. I would highly suggest getting a second person to help with assembly. It comes with a toddler rail. Side rails will have to be purchased separately. I really hope they are available when it's time to change to a big boy bed.
